data.eml:eml: A key to the flat grass scale genus Nipponaclerda (Hemiptera, Coccomorpha, Aclerdidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schneider, Scott A. (2019): A key to the flat grass scale genus Nipponaclerda (Hemiptera, Coccomorpha, Aclerdidae). ZooKeys 862: 81-87, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.862.35294, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.862.35294
